name: Zoo Mania 3D
description:
Build a world-class zoo destination by choosing your animals, hiring staff and entertaining visitors with your animals’ talents. Watch & practically touch them as they come alive in 3D!

Features

• Build your own zoo and manage it to world-class fame! Bring in animals, take care of them, and attract visitors. Manage which animals are out each day and which are in prominent locations.
• Wide variety of 100 realistic 3D animals to collect and discover – unlock more and more animals to bring to your zoo, from penguins, lions and elephants to even extinct animals, each with lifelike movements and noises. The rarer the animal, the more traffic the zoo will get. Plus, as you unlock animals with your points received from entertaining visitors, you will learn fun animal facts and trivia.
• Watch your animals perform awe-inspiring talents and movements and capture them to entertain visitors – Once you have built strong relationships with your animals, use the Nintendo 3DS gyro sensor to capture your animals’ talents as if the handheld were a video camera. Watch and almost touch the animals as they come alive in 3D and show off their personality and skills. The better shots you capture, the more positive feedback you will get from your audience, and the more successful your zoo will become.
• Create a personalized photo album – Capture your favorite animals and their best talents to keep in your photo album and share with friends via SD card.
• Fully leverages Nintendo 3DS technology – features 3D animals, camera and motion-sensing movement and incredibly realistic graphics.
